posts.title: Rooftop Camping Tent
posts.content: Transform your beloved ride into home sweet home using this rooftop camping tent. It features a sturdy aluminum frame complete with a handy ladder, a waterproof coating over the exterior, and 3 screened windows with awnings so you can enjoy the views.

posts.title: Sous Vide Precision Cooker
posts.content: With the Sous Vide precision cooker you’ll be able to whip up dishes so incredibly tender your dinner guests will think they’re dining at a 5-star restaurant. It heats up and maintains water inside the pot to a precise temperature, allowing for maximum moisture retention.

posts.title: The Hover Camera
posts.content: Capture the perfect shot with minimal effort on your end by leaving the job up to the hover camera. Weighing less than 250 grams, this little guy is designed to automatically follow you around and comes with a 4K recording, 13 megapixel camera.

posts.title: Fast Loading Toilet Paper Holder
posts.content: The EZ-Load toilet paper holder makes it remarkably simple to replace an empty roll of TP. Rather than having to struggle with a spring-loaded stick at the center, you simply pop in the new roll with a quick upward motion.

posts.title: Reusable Portable Travel Urinal
posts.content: When you gotta go, you gotta go. With this reusable portable travel urinal you’ll be able to do just that – even if there’s no bathroom in sight. It features a shrinkable design for easy transport and can extend to hold up to 750 mL of liquid.

posts.title: The Banana Phone
posts.content: Isn’t it about time you paired your Apple™ with a Banana™? This fully functional Bluetooth phone pairs with your smartphone and features a talk time of 10 hours so that you can make and take calls on-the-go using this wireless banana.

posts.title: Magnetic Sand Hourglass
posts.content: Entertain your eyes as you keep track of time with the magnetic sand hourglass. Rather than traditional sand, you’ll be treated to an array of mind blowing shapes formed by the iron fillings slowly falling from the top end of the hourglass.

posts.title: Perpetual Energy Sculpture
posts.content: Remember that really cool swinging kinetic energy sculpture that was so distracting in the Iron-Man movie? Sure you do. Well it’s real, and you can buy it! This sculpture makes a cool gift idea for the work place to keep you endlessly distracted.

posts.title: Black Out Roller Stamp
posts.content: Keep sensitive personal information from falling into the wrong hands by blocking it out using this black out roller stamp. It features a half inch width and is made using a specially formulated ink that works over glossy papers and labels.

posts.title: Tile Key Finder
posts.content: Find your keys, EDC gadgets, or just about anything else in record time by attaching the Tile key finder to them. It features a lightweight yet durable and waterproof design with a 200 foot range and an 88 decibel melody that’s 2X as loud as the previous model.

posts.title: Portable Washing Machine
posts.content: Get a machine quality wash while living off the grid with the portable washing machine. At only 5 ounces, this revolutionary washer is remarkably easy to use and efficiently cleans clothes in minutes without the use of electricity – making it ideal for camping trips.

posts.title: Wristband Headphone Earbuds
posts.content: Keep your headphones from morphing into an impossible to untangle cluster of wires by upgrading to these wristband headphone ear buds. When not in use, you can conveniently wrap your headphones around your wrist like a fashionable accessory.
